Package utils

Class ModelOperator

  • java.lang.Object
    • utils.ModelOperator
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FileLoader, FileSaver
    public abstract class ModelOperator
extends java.lang.Object
    File operator class is an abstract class with attributes containing information about tags in file containing saved model. This class will be the base class of all classes that need to either load or save Model.
    Author:
    David Markov

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static java.lang.String MODEL_CLASSIFICATION_CLASSES_FILE_TAG
      Tag in model file followed by the name of file containing the list of available classification classes.
      static java.lang.String MODEL_CLASSIFIER_TAG
      Tag in model file followed by the name of used classifier.
      static java.lang.String MODEL_DOCUMENT_TAG
      Tag in model file followed by information about training document.
      static java.lang.String MODEL_FEATURE_ALGORITHM_TAG
      Tag in model file followed by the name of used feature algorithm.
      static java.lang.String MODEL_FILE_EXTENSION
      The extension of file where Model is saved.
      static java.lang.String MODEL_TRAINING_SET_TAG
      Tag in model file followed by information about training documents nad their features.
